LanguageData.RC2_PlantDreamflower.label: dreamflower plant
LanguageData.RC2_PlantDreamflower.description: A plant useful for its ornamental properties - but more importantly, used in the production of a variety of drugs and medicines.
LanguageData.RC2_PlantDreamflowerHydro.label: dreamflower plant
LanguageData.RC2_PlantDreamflowerHydro.description: A plant useful for its ornamental properties - but more importantly, used in the production of a variety of drugs and medicines.
LanguageData.RC2_PlantTobacco.label: tobacco plant
LanguageData.RC2_PlantTobacco.description: A big, leafy plant whose leaves are dried and rolled into cigars and cigarettes. The plant naturally contains nicotine, a highly addictive substance.
LanguageData.RC2_PlantTobaccoHydro.label: tobacco plant
LanguageData.RC2_PlantTobaccoHydro.description: A big, leafy plant whose leaves are dried and rolled into cigars and cigarettes. The plant naturally contains nicotine, a highly addictive substance.
LanguageData.RC2_PlantShrooms.label: shrooms
LanguageData.RC2_PlantShrooms.description: An 'edible' fungus not eaten for its nutritional benefit, but instead the psychadelic euphorea it gives when eaten. Careful though, too much.. and you might never find your way back to reality.
LanguageData.RC2_PlantShroomsHydro.label: shrooms
LanguageData.RC2_PlantShroomsHydro.description: An 'edible' fungus not eaten for its nutritional benefit, but instead the psychadelic euphorea it gives when eaten. Careful though, too much.. and you might never find your way back to reality.
